api_list.api_description: Retrieve champion data for a specified version and language.

required_parameters.name: version
required_parameters.description: The version of the data files.

api_list.api_description: Retrieve all cards, or filter them by name, supertype, types, and hp.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: The name of the card to filter by.

optional_parameters.name: supertype
optional_parameters.description: The supertype of the card, such as Pokémon, Energy, or Trainer.

optional_parameters.name: types
optional_parameters.description: The energy types for a card, such as Fire, Water, Grass, etc.

optional_parameters.name: hp
optional_parameters.description: The hit points of the card to filter by.

query: Can you provide details of the latest League of Legends champion data in English, and also fetch details of Pokémon cards with the name 'Pikachu'?
